title: Utopian Art by Zdislaw Beksinski 1929-2005 (Art Paintings nrg)

Art by Zdzislaw Beksinski

Zdzislaw Beksilski (24 February 1929 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 21 February 2005) was a Polish painter, photographer and sculptor, specializing in the field of utopian art. BeksiÃ…â€žski did his paintings and drawings in what he called either a 'Baroque' or a 'Gothic' manner. His creations were made mainly in two periods. The first period of work is generally considered to contain expressionistic color, with a strong style of "utopian realism" and surreal architecture, like a doomsday scenario. The second period contained more abstract style, with the main features of formalism.

Beksinski was murdered in 2005.
